channel.title: CVE Feed for Acoustic Technology, Inc. (ATI Systems) -- Emergency Mass Notification Systems
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Acoustic Technology, Inc. (ATI Systems) -- Emergency Mass Notification Systems

item.title: CVE-2018-8862|2024-08-05T07:10:46.251Z -- acoustic%20technology%2C%20inc.%20%28ati%20systems%29 -- emergency%20mass%20notification%20systems
item.description: In ATI Systems Emergency Mass Notification Systems (HPSS16, HPSS32, MHPSS, and ALERT4000) devices, an improper authentication vulnerability caused by specially crafted malicious radio transmissions may allow an attacker to remotely trigger false alarms.
